Class PsyOutput

java.lang.Object
coneforest.psylla.core.PsyOutput
All Implemented Interfaces:
PsyCloseable, PsyFlushable, PsyObject, PsyWritable
@Type("output") public abstract class PsyOutput extends Object implements PsyCloseable, PsyFlushable, PsyWritable
The representation of output.
